# AI Fortune Oracle
> Pay 0.1 USDC via x402 on Base, draw 3 fortune sticks, get AI-powered Lunar New Year interpretation.

## Docs
- [Skill Doc](https://xinchunsuanming.vercel.app/skill.md): Full API documentation for AI agents
- [Health Check](https://xinchunsuanming.vercel.app/api/health): Service status

## Quick Start
npx awal x402 pay https://xinchunsuanming.vercel.app/api/fortune/interpret -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"stickNumbers":[42,17,88],"category":"career","language":"zh-CN"}'

## API Endpoints
- POST /api/fortune/interpret — 0.1 USDC via x402, AI fortune interpretation
- POST /api/fortune/interpret-free — Free testing endpoint
- GET /api/health — Health check
- GET /api/skill — Skill documentation (JSON)
- GET /skill.md — Skill documentation (Markdown)
